node.title: How To Combine Humanitarian Work and Mission At Home and Abroad
node.description: What is “disinterested benevolence” all about and how does it relate to Jesus’ method of reaching people? Is it possible to combine humanitarian work through ADRA and other organizations with what we normally call gospel mission? Should they at all be run together? Does ADRA have to stay out of “religious” activities? What is actually “religious activity”? How can/should I share the gospel to other cultures? I have a desire to get international experience and serve God in other countries – what do I need to do to make that dream come true?
